needs: Hassan seeks to leverage data science expertise to deliver measurable outcomes within constrained timeframes, focusing on causal inference, experimentation, and uplift modeling to optimize campaigns and reduce costs. Their part-time capacity and emphasis on early unknown identification require pragmatic, incremental delivery supported by clear instrumentation and cross-functional alignment.
personality: Hassan communicates with clarity and empathy, valuing coaching-led collaboration and transparent decision-making. They prioritize simplicity, readable code, and humane processes, favoring small experiments over debates and proactive risk mitigation. Their style is disciplined and accountable, maintaining lightweight documentation to ensure shared understanding and iterative progress toward well-defined outcomes.
